verses.name: Exodus 31:9
verses.text: And the altar of burnt offering with all his furniture, and the laver and his foot,

verses.name: Exodus 31:10
verses.text: And the cloths of service, and the holy garments for Aaron the priest, and the garments of his sons, to minister in the priest’s office,

verses.name: Exodus 31:11
verses.text: And the anointing oil, and sweet incense for the holy place: according to all that I have commanded thee shall they do.

verses.name: Exodus 31:12
verses.text: And the Lord spake unto Moses, saying,
